name: Uptime Kuma
description: Self-hosted monitoring tool. Monitor HTTP(s), TCP, DNS, Docker containers, and more with a beautiful UI.
author: StumpfWorks
compose:
version: '3.8'

services:
  uptime-kuma:
    image: louislam/uptime-kuma:latest
    container_name: uptime-kuma
    ports:
      - 3001:3001
    volumes:
      - {{DATA_PATH}}:/app/data
      - /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock:ro
    restart: unless-stopped
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=uptime-kuma"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=monitoring"

notes: Supports multiple notification channels (Discord, Telegram, Email, etc.)
Can monitor Docker containers if socket is mounted
